resources.string: Hello I am Nala and I am here to help you use your smart phone.. The menu you see contains all thing you can ask me to help you with. Whenever you need me please tap the button above the menu and tell me one of the menu choices!
Ok! Please tell me the contact name.
Now tell me the contact number.
Who would you want me to call?
I am so sorry I cannot find a contact with this name! Please try again
